item.title: GitHub actions, checkout and submodule
item.description: I now use GitHub Actions to deploy this website (see my previous note about it) and last Monday (two days ago ðŸ˜ƒ) after I pushed I got an email saying the deployment failed and found the following error message in the console log: 1 ##[error]The input 'submodules' is not supported in actions/checkout@v2 Turns out this is because version 2 of checkout does not support submodule yet (see this issue report https://github.
